metadata.title: USN-2720-1 -- Django vulnerability
metadata.description: Lin Hua Cheng discovered that Django incorrectly handled the session store. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause the session store to fill up, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-2720-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python-django-doc - 1.6.1-2ubuntu0.10 python-django - 1.6.1-2ubuntu0.10 No subscription required
